t: PJ Harvey - Dry[LP] - Amazon.com Music
s: PJ Harvey's seminal album "Dry" needs almost no introduction. Long out of print on the vinyl format, this has been beautifully repressed and remastered. From the low bass throbs at the beginning of album opener "Oh My Lover" it's clear that this offers up a substantially new listening experience.

t: Amazon.com: To Bring You My Love[LP]: CDs & Vinyl
s: I only recently discovered PJ Harvey after finding her via a popular music app. I listen to this album a few times there and decided I wanted to own a vinyl copy for my collection. Very happy with my purchase, the music is perfect and I plan to purchase more of her albums. The vinyl is good quality and the album packaging too. I definitely recommend the album in whatever format ...

t: PJ Harvey - White Chalk[LP] - Amazon.com Music
